    • 方法详细资料

      • heartbeat

        public void heartbeat(SDRemoteTaskObject taskObject)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        heartbeat in Map Reduce layer. In order for map reduce to moniter status of slave node, aka task trackers.
        指定者:
        heartbeat 在接口中 SDJobService
        参数:
        taskObject - Descriptor of task trakcer.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - throws when network fail.
